name: Easy Creole Okra and Shrimp
author: jrchef
summary: This recipe is quick easy and delicious. Spoon over white rice and enjoy.
ingredients: 3  cooked andouille sausage, cut into quarters
1 (10 ounce) package frozen cut okra, thawed
2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning, or to taste
2 pounds peeled and deveined medium shrimp (30-40 per pound)
directions: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Stir in the bell pepper and onion; cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes
Stir in the tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes, then add the okra, sausage, Cajun seasoning, and salt
Stir in the shrimp and cook until they are bright pink on the outside and the meat is no longer transparent in the center, 8 to 12 minutes
